casebody.data:
177 A.3d 131 STATE OF NEW JERSEY, PLAINTIFF-RESPONDENT, v. MARK LOVETT, DEFENDANT-PETITIONER.

C-452 September Term 2017

079746 December 13, 2017

ON PETITION FOR CERTIFICATION

To the Appellate Division, Superior Court:

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-002572-14 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is denied.
